remarks: Subtraction in the matrix ring is cell-wise.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Aug-2019.)
statement:
matplusgcell.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
matplusgcell.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
matsubgcell.s $e |- S = ( -g ` A ) $.
matsubgcell.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` R ) $.
matsubgcell $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ ( I e. N /\ J e. N ) ) -> ( I ( X S Y ) J ) = ( ( I X J ) .- ( I Y J ) ) ) $.
